text: In total, Module 1 should take you roughly 10 and a half hours. Now what I've done is I've broken down each part into its various elements and given you a guided amount of allocated time. If you look, Part 1 should take you 2 hours and 45 minutes. This is broken down into an hour for principles, 45 minutes for concept checker and summary, and 1 hour for the playbook entry. Part 2 should take you 2 hours and 15 minutes. 45 minutes for Principles, 30 minutes for Summary Concept Checker and 1 hour for Playbook Entry. Part 3 should take you 2 hours and 15 minutes. Principles 45 minutes, Summary and Concept Checker 30 minutes and the Playbook Entry 1 hour. And part 4 should take you 3 hours and 15 minutes, Principles 45 minutes, the Summary and Concept Checker 30 minutes and the Playbook Entry 2 hours. Most important guys, don't rush through each section. Spend a lot of time particularly on your playbook as this will reinforce the principles you've learnt. More importantly, this playbook will go through you for the rest of your trading career as you continue to develop and evolve.
